libpg::Policy

Public Member Functions

virtual ~Policy ()
virtual void getAction (Vector dist, Vector &action, Observation &obs)=0

Detailed Description

This class defines the policy used to select the next action. Each policy will be implemented as a subclass of this kind.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void libpg::Policy::getAction ( Vector  dist,
Vector &  action,
Observation &  obs 
) [pure virtual]

Sample next action according to policy, given a vector and observations. Note that the dist value vector is passed by copy deliberately.

Parameters:
dist the vector of values for each action
action return value indicting appropriate action(s)
obs the observation vector

Implemented in libpg::eGreedyPolicy, and libpg::SoftmaxPolicy.

Referenced by libpg::SARSAController::getAction(), libpg::QLearningController::getAction(), and libpg::LSTDQController::getAction().
